default.shortDescription: Powell Software’s mission is to help companies meet the challenges of the hybrid workplace while promoting inclusivity for all employees thanks to collaboration tools that are easily accessible to all.
default.featuredTitle: Powell Teams, A modern collaboration experience that is effortless, organized, easy to manage and governed.
featuredParagraphs:
Powell Teams is the collaboration pillar  of the Powell  365 Digital Workplace which also includes  Powell Intranet, the communication and employee engagement pillar. Powell Teams value proposition is aimed at all employees, and business functions, especially HR, internal communications and IT teams. 

For Employees, Powell Teams enhances the user experience by making it easier for users to access and search for the Microsoft Teams to which they belong. Powell Teams offers an intuitive dashboard to filter Teams based on business criteria.  It also helps manage the proliferation of Teams. Powell Teams also guides users by offering ready-to-use Teams templates that allow users to create a complete team in 3 clicks. The Team comes loaded with channels, applications, and tabs.

For IT, IT teams need to strike the right balance between adopting Microsoft 365 to the business context, making it easy for employees to use, and complying with the rules of security, compliance and good IT management. Powell Teams allows IT to set up an agile governance, defining criteria such as: 
  • Naming rule and labels
  • External or internal, public, or private access rights
  • Number of owners and team members
  • Expiration and archiving
  • Approval process

For internal communication departments, Powell Teams enables access to the intranet within the business team where it is most relevant:   for example, the document repository for the Sales department is accessible in the form of a tab directly in each of the Sales RFP teams. Another example is the page containing all the welcoming documents which is attached to the team created to onboard a newcomer.

callToAction.description: If you want more information about Powell Software products or to talk about your project, fill in the contact form and we will get back to you shortly.
